update TS_DEVICE
DEVICETYPE = #{devicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICENAME = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGTYPE = #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ROADID = #{roadid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MASTERIP = #{masterip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACEIP = #{interfaceip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICEIP = #{deviceip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHAFTSTAKENUM = #{shaftstakenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DEVICECOMPANY = #{devicecompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STOPTIMETHRESHOLD = #{stoptimethreshold,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOWSPEEDTHRESHOLD = #{lowspeedthreshold,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

SYSLOGINTERVAL = #{sysloginterval,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WATERMARKNAME = #{watermarkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GISADDRESS = #{gisaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSHEIGHT = #{posheight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HORIZONTALANGLE = #{horizontalangle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CABRAGEANGLE = #{cabrageangle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LANENUM = #{lanenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COVERAGEAREA = #{coveragearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GATEWAYS = #{gateways,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICEMAC = #{devicemac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIGHTNUM = #{lightnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DRIVINGDIRECTION = #{drivingdirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPSHAFTSTAKE = #{upshaftstake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPSHAFTDIS = #{upshaftdis,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPJUNCNAME = #{upjuncname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPJUNCDIS = #{upjuncdis,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DOWNSHAFTSTAKE = #{downshaftstake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOWNSHAFTDIS = #{downshaftdis,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DOWNJUNCNAME = #{downjuncname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOWNJUNCDIS = #{downjuncdis,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUILDSTATE = #{buildstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONVERGEBOX = #{convergebox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONVERGETIME = #{convergetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEVICETRANSTIME = #{devicetranstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEVICEREMOVETIME = #{deviceremovetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONSTRUCTIONUNIT = #{constructionunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLICEDEVID = #{policedevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJNAME = #{objname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FTPPORT = #{ftpport,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FTPUSER = #{ftpuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FTPPASSWORD = #{ftppassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSPIC1 = #{pospic1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKPIC = #{checkpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICERESOLUTION = #{deviceresolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICENUM = #{devicenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSPIC2 = #{pospic2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACHMENT = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESIGNPIC = #{designpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIDEOPATH = #{videopath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKID = #{linkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECTID = #{sectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSPIC4 = #{pospic4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

OTHERLANENO = #{otherlaneno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISALL = #{isall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DEVICEID = #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
